Ooooorr, or, ororororrrr, or.
Buff everyone else?
http://i.ytimg.com/vi/Wm2IaA8ZILc/maxresdefault.jpg
Nice.
Just look at Exil's video on Balancing Yasuo; lol :P
Or just don't play a squishy assassin/marksman when laning against him, dodge his q laterally and don't engage when he has static shiv and you have no armour

Or you could literally just learn to play against him. 

I, just like you, use to think he was broken, however then I stopped whining and realised that he is actually an extremely easy champion to counter if you know how.

It's 2 AM in the morning and I honestly can't be bothered explaining his weaknesses and how you can exploit them, but their are multiple guides and videos online which will do a good job of explaining. Just take some time to look one up and then Yasuo will (hopefully) never destroy you in lane again.
